name: Shinnok
title: The Fallen Elder God
subtitle: A corrupted deity who wields dark magic and soul manipulation
lore: Once an Elder God, Shinnok's insatiable hunger for power led to his fall from grace. Now wielding the power of his mystical amulet and dark magic, he seeks to dominate all realms. His mastery over souls and ability to manipulate minds makes him a formidable opponent who grows stronger with each enemy he defeats.

passive.name: The Power of the Amulet
passive.description: Killing an enemy fighter grants Shinnok [40] AP.

Q.name: Amulet Beam
Q.description: Shinnok shoots a beam from his staff's amulet, which steals [5HP] from the target hit increasing Shinnok's HP by the amount. It also deals [50/160/255/455/555 + (100% AP)] damage.

W.name: Triple Power Soul
W.description: Shinnok launches 3 Soul balls from the ground after each other. All souls deal [45/155/270/355/500 + (100% AP)] damage. The last soul knocks up the enemies hit by [0.5s].

E.name: Bone Grasp
E.description: Shinnok summons a bone hand from the ground. It can grab an enemy if they stand in the area and rooting them for [2s]. Grabbed enemies take [65%] more damage from Shinnok.

R.name: Mind Control
R.description: By Clicking on a nearby enemy, Shinnok can control the enemy's movement for [1s/1.5s/2s]. Shinnok can use spells during mind control.

1.name: Essence Reaver
1.description: Killing an enemy fighter now grants Shinnok [60] AP instead of [40], but his abilities cost 10% more mana

1.name: Dark Pact
1.description: Shinnok's Q, when used on a minion or non-champion unit, refunds 50% of its mana cost and heals Shinnok for [5%] of his missing health

1.name: Bone Collector
1.description: Shinnok's E now also summons two smaller bone hands that slow enemies by 30% for 1.5 seconds if they touch them

5.name: Soul Reaver
5.description: Triple Power Soul's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds, and each soul ball now also restores [10%] of Shinnok's maximum mana if it hits an enemy

5.name: Crippling Grasp
5.description: The bone hand now applies a 40% slow for 1 second after the root ends.

5.name: Amulet's Call
5.description: Shinnok's Q now has a 25% chance to instantly reset its cooldown if it hits an enemy, and it deals an additional 10% damage to targets below 30% health

10.name: Puppet Master
10.description: Mind Control's duration is increased by 0.5 second, and the controlled enemy gains a 20% movement speed buff that decays over the duration

10.name: Mind Flayer
10.description: Enemies under Mind Control take 25% more damage from Shinnok's abilities for the duration

15.name: Soul Surge
15.description: Each soul ball from Triple Power Soul now reduces the cooldown of Shinnok's other abilities by 0.5 seconds when it hits an enemy

15.name: Amulet Mastery
15.description: Killing an enemy now increases Shinnok's overall damage reduction by 1%

20.name: Eternal Damnation
20.description: Every 10th kill or assist grants Shinnok additional [80AP]

20.name: Unleashed Souls
20.description: Triple Power Soul now fires 5 soul balls instead of 3

20.name: Dark Reclamation
20.description: Shinnok's Q now heals for 10% of the damage dealt to enemy champions, and the beam can chain to up to 2 additional nearby enemies, dealing 50% of the original damage.

20.name: Bone Prison
20.description: Bone hands break complete damage reductions (Physical and Magical) for the root duration
